openaiSpec.name: render_feynman_diagram

title.description: The title of the Feynman diagram to display above the diagram.

width.description: The width of the rendered diagram in pixels.

height.description: The height of the rendered diagram in pixels.

feynMF_code.description: The raw feynMF code as a single string to define the structure of the Feynman diagram. Due to current limitation, use `fmf{ghost}` instead of `fmf{dashes}` for dashed or higgs line

openaiSpec.description: Render Feynman diagrams using feynMF syntax, similar to LaTeX.
